name: Doppelganger (Xant)
description:
The party has started, and the guests have arrived. There are food and drinks for everyone, but someone or something has sneaked in, changing its appearance. Where did he come from, and what are his intentions? Bad omens for this party.

Doppelgänger is a short first-person drink shooter where you must unmask an unknown menace.

This game was created for the Global Game Jam in January 2022 with "duality" as the theme.

by  Antonio Alba & Gonzalo Tirado
